Posts.Content: Hi yepitsme, you need to have the lump checked by a doctor. Can you talk with your mom or another trusted female about making the appt? Good luck.
Posts.Title: lump on my right breast

Posts.Content: I recommend that you do the biopsy. I had a needle biopsy with negative results. Why worry for 6 months?
Posts.Title: Needle Biopsy or Wait 6 Months?
